name: @rajrai/mui-theme-manager
description: A lightweight React component library for creating, editing, and managing MUI v6+ theme presets in real time.
author: Raj Rai

scripts.build: cross-env BUILD_TARGET=lib NODE_ENV=production vite build --config vite.config.ts && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:demo: cross-env BUILD_TARGET=lib NODE_ENV=production vite build --config vite.config.ts && cross-env BUILD_TARGET=demo NODE_ENV=production vite build --config vite.config.ts
scripts.demo: npm run build:demo && cross-env BUILD_TARGET=demo NODE_ENV=development vite --config vite.config.ts
scripts.publish:public: npm run build && npm publish --access public
